title: How to Make the Perfect Supernatural Family on Sims 3 Supernatural

steps.headline: First, go into create a sim.
Click Werewolf.
steps.description: You can change what it looks like while it's transformed or normal.

steps.headline: Create a vampire.
steps.description: Remember, these are prone to sunlight unless you make the Vampiric Sunscreen Elixir. They have pale skin and bright eyes that can not be change be brightness.

steps.headline: Create a witch.
steps.description: Give her a witch hat found in the 'hair with accessories'.

steps.headline: Create a fairy.
steps.description: When you make a house, be sure to give them a fairy home in the supernatural section that they can sleep in.

steps.headline: Possibly make a ghost.
steps.description: The tombstone selector is the best for this as you can pick what type of death.

steps.headline: Pick their traits, star sign and Favorite food, music and change their voice.

text: First, go into create a sim. Fairly easy. Click Werewolf. You can change what it looks like while it's transformed or normal. Create a vampire. Remember, these are prone to sunlight unless you make the Vampiric Sunscreen Elixir. They have pale skin and bright eyes that can not be change be brightness. Create a witch. Give her a witch hat found in the 'hair with accessories'. Create a fairy. When you make a house, be sure to give them a fairy home in the supernatural section that they can sleep in. Possibly make a ghost. The tombstone selector is the best for this as you can pick what type of death. Make a Genie.  Pick their traits, star sign and Favorite food, music and change their voice. Make them perfect. Play!
